page.shortlink: grid component client side beforeajaxcallback event
page.description: Fires before any Ajax callback is made to the server. This event can be used to put up a "working" message while the callback is executing.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: ajaxEvent
property.description: The name of the action that triggered the callback.
